sentence: FLORIDA: Republican Governor Ron DeSantis in April signed a 15-week abortion ban, which allows exceptions for medical emergencies or if the fetus has a fatal abnormality.
author: Gabriella Borter
title: Factbox-Restrictions vs protections: How U.S. states are taking sides on abortion
